elements.name: question1
elements.title: Which advertising media do you know?
elements.correctAnswer: Advertising letter, advertisement, poster, advertising print, brochure, advertising film, advertising slogan

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Create a list of advertising media from the cheapest to the most expensive.
elements.correctAnswer: Possible order: advertising letter, advertisement, flyer, leaflet, advertising slogan, catalog, poster, advertising film

elements.name: question3
elements.title: A TV spot (e.g. lasting 30 seconds) does not cost the same at all broadcasting times. When is the fee for broadcasting probably the highest? Give reasons for your answer.
elements.correctAnswer: Before the news at 7.30 p.m., because this is the time when most viewers are watching TV.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Name possible reasons why tobacco and alcohol advertising is prohibited on Swiss television.
elements.correctAnswer: This advertising encourages the increased consumption of harmful stimulants.
